sourcesContent:
import React,{useEffect} from "react"; import './singlePost.css'; import axios from "axios"; import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; export default function SinglePost() { const location=useLocation() const path=(location.pathname.split("/")[2]) const[post,setPost]=useState({}) useEffect(()=>{ const getPost= async()=>{ const res=await axios.get("/posts/"+path) console.log(res) }; getPost(); }, [path]); return(
